detectors.description:
consensus_finance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/consensus_finance.sol#36-45) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/consensus_finance.sol#38)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/consensus_finance.sol#39)

detectors.description:
